title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1alpha2\ConfigureDnsSettingsRequest
name: ConfigureDnsSettingsRequest
description:
Request for the ConfigureDnsSettings method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1alpha2.ConfigureDnsSettingsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.registration
params.description: Required. The name of the Registration whose DNS settings are being updated, in the format projects/*/locations/*/registrations/*.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. The field mask describing which fields to update as a comma-separated list. For example, if only the name servers are being updated for an existing Custom DNS configuration, the update_mask is "custom_dns.name_servers". When changing the DNS provider from one type to another, pass the new provider's field name as part of the field mask. For example, when changing from a Google Domains DNS configuration to a Custom DNS configuration, the update_mask is "custom_dns". //

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Validate the request without actually updating the DNS settings.
